#labels Phase-Requirements
Semantic Web Ontology generating software library

= Introduction =

Takes Markdown / SKOS / DC / OBI / OWL-RDF-XML and generates an XHTML document which is a GRDDL source document with Manchester OWL syntax documentation of the terms in the ontology.


= Details =

Uses:
  * Sparta
  * RDFLib
  * 4Suite
  * Amara
